name: @creditkarma/dynamic-config
description: Dynamic Config for Node.js backed by Consul and Vault

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: wait-on --timeout 10000 http://localhost:8500 http://localhost:8201 && node dist/tests/integration/bootstrap.js && NODE_ENV=test mocha --full-trace --timeout 15000 dist/tests/integration/**/*.spec.js
